document_data.title: The Burning Chalice
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"The Burning Chalice"''' is a short story by [[Ed Greenwood]] included in the 2000 anthology ''[[The Halls of Stormweather]]'', the introductory volume of the [[Sembia: Gateway to the Realms]] series.
document_data.Summary: When a maid suddenly picks up the Quaff to dust it, it does not burst into flames.This is because the maid, though unidentified in the short story, is Larajin, who unbeknownst to everyone (and herself) is Thamalon's daughter. Larajin's interaction with the Quaff was confirmed in ''Lord of Stormweather'', chap. 15.
